fluxbox is in universe, enable it using synaptic
if you need more info, give me a shout
Open up synaptic, under System -> Administration -> Synaptic Package Manager, click Setting - >Repositories, click 'Add' and select 'Universe' and 'Multiverse'
Reload the package list, and fluxbox will be there, double-click to install it
